title: Fixed bug in which user's data would get lost in the settings menu
message:
Fixed bug in which user's data would get lost in the settings menu
Now a numpad pops up instead of the keyboard when entering the diagonal length of the screen

title: Changed functions to better follow "DRY" (Don't Repeat Yourself)
message:
Changed functions to better follow "DRY" (Don't Repeat Yourself)

Added overwrite protection so now users won't overwrite any saved thumb data

title: Finally uploaded to Google Play!
message: Finally uploaded to Google Play!

title: Finally added icon!  Added arrows to show how to swipe.  Minor changes.
message: Finally added icon!  Added arrows to show how to swipe.  Minor changes.

title: Removed the animated progress indicator because it would add unnecessary…
message: Removed the animated progress indicator because it would add unnecessary complexity to this project and I have higher priorities of things to work on right now.  I'll maybe come back to it later.  But, there is still a static progress indicator.

title: Added progress indicator, but right now it doesn't spin during the calculation…
message: Added progress indicator, but right now it doesn't spin during the calculation because the CPU spends all of it's time on the calculation and doesn't go back to the GUI thread.  My next job will be to run the calculation on another thread.

title: Added a progress indicator class
message: Added a progress indicator class

title: I am now releasing the source to this under the MIT license.
message: I am now releasing the source to this under the MIT license.

title: Create README.md
message: Create README.md

title: Fixed the outlier recognition and deletion algorithm to clean up data points…
message:
Fixed the outlier recognition and deletion algorithm to clean up data points caused by the palm touching
the screen.

Added a function to calculate the average point in a QList<QPoint>

title: Removed an old, unncessary calculation
message:
Removed an old, unncessary calculation

Added code that removes outlier points that can be caused by accidentally touching the side of the screen while testing and any other accidental screen touches

title: fixed screenOrientation to portait
message: fixed screenOrientation to portait

title: Added workaround for issue where data points would be captured through other dialogs.
message: Added workaround for issue where data points would be captured through other dialogs.

title: Fixed blackscreen on resume bug
message:
Fixed blackscreen on resume bug

Removed version display from UI

Added ability to call functions from the menu instead of the buttons (I might remove the buttons later)

The test info and trial number have been moved to fit better on smaller screens

Layout of the settings screen was changed to better scale

The dialog that opens upon a successful save now tells the user where the files were saved

title: Fixed bug where grid would not be drawn after saving settings
message: Fixed bug where grid would not be drawn after saving settings

title: Fixed memory leaks caused by dialogs
message:
Fixed memory leaks caused by dialogs

Now the settings dialog is shown at startup

title: Possible fix for phone screen sized rendering
message: Possible fix for phone screen sized rendering

title: Wow…. I guess I need to spend less time programming and more time studying English.
message: Wow…. I guess I need to spend less time programming and more time studying English.

title: Removed uneeded link to QRegExp
message: Removed uneeded link to QRegExp

title: Increased font and UI element sizes to make them more touch friendly
message:
Increased font and UI element sizes to make them more touch friendly
Reorganized code to make it easier to read
Renamed pbCalibrate to pbReset to better reflect its purpose
Range of motion is now displayed in the center of the window after analyzation
Miscellaneous other changes

title: Improved the centerpoint finding algorithm and now the user can analyze the data multiple times
message: Improved the centerpoint finding algorithm and now the user can analyze the data multiple times

title: Removed some of the ineffective center point finding algorithm
message: Removed some of the ineffective center point finding algorithm

title: Trashing data points outside of the scene rect
message:
Trashing data points outside of the scene rect
Changed error checking for center point finding

title: Improved algorithm for finding the center of the circle that trashes obviously…
message: Improved algorithm for finding the center of the circle that trashes obviously extraneous values before calculating the rough average, which is then used to remove more extraneous values before a final average is taken

title: Rolling average for center points has been added
message: Rolling average for center points has been added

title: Added distance calculation functions
message:
Added distance calculation functions
Added average point calculation function

title: Lines are drawn to indicate the sector of the ROM
message:
Lines are drawn to indicate the sector of the ROM
"Analyze" button added to separate data analysis from saving data

title: Ability to calculate ROM in degrees
message:
Ability to calculate ROM in degrees
ROM object added to hold data

title: The app can now successfully estimate the circle made by the arc
message: The app can now successfully estimate the circle made by the arc

title: Split up circle calculation function
message:
Split up circle calculation function
Added in basic ability to get an average center point
Changed the graphic of the circle

title: Records data points only once now and saves them to a list
message:
Records data points only once now and saves them to a list
Better performance because data points are only added once

An estimated circle is now drawn on the screen (kind of accurate, but not always)

title: Added a version display method
message:
Added a version display method
Stopped displaying the X and Y CM coordinates in the upper left of the application
Added trial number to the display
Improved performance of settingsDialog by pausing the data gathering of the QGraphicsView

title: I think I fixed the CTD (crash to desktop) bug that happened sometimes when I…
message:
I think I fixed the CTD (crash to desktop) bug that happened sometimes when I clicked the "save" button in SettingsDialog.  I haven't had it affect me in a little while after I added some code to the function that calls SettingsDialog.
Added the ability to set the diagonal centimeter distance of the app (NOT THE ENTIRE SCREEN).

title: Changed name from MouseTest to ThumbArea
message:
Changed name from MouseTest to ThumbArea
Added Error Dialog for file saving issues
Added Saved Dialog for file saving success
Added Settings Dialog for saving settings
Changed the filename formation

title: First commit of the 2.0 thumb app that measures area of movement in different planes.
message:
First commit of the 2.0 thumb app that measures area of movement in different planes.
Great performance on at the Acer A500.
